item.title: Second Article
item.description: My daughter painted this tree when she was about 10 years old. What is unusual about it, is that she’s given the root system just as much attention and space as the part of the tree most of us draw when we think of a “tree”.

item.title: Article 1
item.description: As a third culture kid - now adult - my survival strategy was to adapt. Adapt to the local surroundings, blend in, do as the Romans do.

item.title: About Me

item.title: Coaching

item.title: OldGrow
item.description: You are a leader who is: Growth-oriented, idealistic, and mission-driven. In some personal and/or professional transition. Committed to personal and professional growth, but have reached the limits of what you can do by yourself.

item.title: Success Stories
item.description: I started coaching with Karin to gain traction on elusive long term goals - things I’d been working on for years, but hadn’t made much progress with.
